review_text: Received it looking like it had been thrown in a box (with fake cable and plug).  Phone doesn't work at all in only 3 days.  Returning it.
this phone did not work correctly. it constantly buzzed when i was on calls and no one could hear me.

I was scheptical about ordering this due to the bad reviews, but I thought I would give it a try. Although the phone arrived in record time and looks brand new, the battery only holds a charge for about 2 hours, and dies at 40%. Seller was no help. I am returning, but will give them another shot. I'll update when the second one arrives.

I originally gave this phone a good review (see below). Bought it in May, it is now October. The battery started overheating so ordered a new one. The overheating battery fried the screen so had to replace that also. Already the new battery is overheating. The screen is extremely sensitive so it frequently goes on hold or turns on the speaker phone while I am on a call, just from a slight touch to my face. Also, the phone does not hold a charge for very long. It seemed like a good price but it only lasted for 5 months before I had to have it fixed. It now looks like it's pretty much done for and I will need yet another phone. Essentially, I have rented a phone for 5 months for $150 plus the repair bill for the battery and the screen. About $50/month... seems a little high.

Bought it to replace a broken phone(android). Couldn’t activate it. Was told by Sprint customer service the reason I cannot activate it was I didn’t start my plan with this model - I started my plan with a higher model. So they cannot activate with anything less that what I started with in my plan. Really?! Too much work to return it. So I let my toddler use it as an iPod (using wifi only). Nowhere did I find any information from people or reviews about the reason I couldn’t activate the phone. So make sure you check with your service provider before getting any replacement phone from anywhere. A lesson learned.

I bought this phone to send it to overseas to a family member. Therefore, I have read every detail the seller wrote about this phone. It was stated as "fully tested and worked" "apple certified" ... etc , but none of these are true I'm my case. The battery of my phone can't stay on for 5 minutes phone call. Please buy from other sellers.

What a Horrible Phone. I tweaked all the settings to give a longer battery life (turned off all location services and all notifications) and the phone goes from 100% Full Charge to 31% in just under 4 hours of browsing, messaging and texting ONLY. At 31%, it shuts off and when I try to restart, it shows 0% battery.
This iPhone didn't work when I bought it - Be careful before buying "Certified Preowned Items"

We are particularly pleased with this refurbished phone. After much research and prior excellent experiences with Apple refurbished products, we decided the 5s 16 gb was the way to go. This phone appears to be showroom fresh in every way. We held our breath as the previous refurbished I phone 5 obtained through Amazon was thoroughly unsatisfactory. (This was from an outside vendor) The last phone had large gouged on the top sides and some sort of Smith on the case which we couldn't remove.

I bought this phone for my niece for Christmas. Before I purchased it, I made sure it started that it was compatible with Straight Talk. I bought a sim card and one month of service from Straight Talk for the phone. On Christmas when my niece tried to activate it with Straight Talk, they said that it wasn't compatible. I have reached out to the company with no return call or email. I just wasted my money either on the phone itself or the monthly plan I purchased from Straight Talk. If the situation gets resolved I will change my rating. Right now I'm not a happy buyer.

This started out fine then within 3 months the battery or battery connection is a major problem . Once unplugged and at 100 charge, it last 2 min and phone shuts off. Tried everything and it all just shuts down till you plug it in, it comes back then shuts down again! Guess it was turned in for a reason! You get what you pay for I guess!

Beware refurbished models. The first phone i received had some old sun-damaged screen, the edges were yellowish, and center had a obvious red blotch. A day later I noticed that the frame was actually bent wtf? Sent it back and bought a new one.

Agree with review by Chris Robotham. The item description specifically says this is a GSM phone compatible with AT&T networks. The phone I received is marked as a Verizon phone for CDMA networks. This is the exact opposite of what the product description says. The phone appears to work (so far) but is not the item described. I am keeping the phone, but would not buy it again.
Great phone.  No problems yet and not anticipating any.
Great buy had it for a long time before getting the iPhone 7

I am very satisfied with my iPhone.  There is a lot to learn yet, but I am amazed so far at what i can do with this cell phone.  i have all my phone contacts listed and I like the crisp reception I get on long distance with AT&T.  I have added some games that I enjoy playing on the computer.  The reception is really good, with  bright, clear colors..  Learning new things every day.  5-star rating.

Purchase this phone for my husband to use while deployed. This device is very crappy. Also I am using Apple chargers the phone still will not hold a charge. It will jump from 100 to 45 Percent in less than 10 minutes. Then it will turnoff which makes me think that there is a problem with the battery
It's all wonderful, just didn't get the charger with it. It's a good thing I had one with my old phone. Other than that, it was a good purchase.

very disappointed with this product... it said refurbished which usually means a new battery and such but i have to charge my "new" phone 3 times a day ... refurbished really means i wiped if off with a rag and put in a box with a gas station charger after i factory reset it
Phone is fine but the charger did not work.
Its not even 2 months that i have it and it started freezing. The camera is also blurry.

I bought this phone because I was going on an overseas trip. Actually bought 2 phones but only one from this vendor. The phone was defective as it would not hold a charge. I was very disappointed as I could not communicate with the US with the phone dying with 30 minutes of being disconnected from charge.

This phone lasted approximately 2 months, the speaker volume on my phone calls didn't work. THe phone was very slow. I saw that the glass was peaking out of the frame. At some point, it barely moved from screen to screen, Highly disappointed but I learned my lesson.

Works almost like new, which is to be expected from a "Certified Refurbished" product. Only complaint is the power button; only the left half of the top button works, and pressing the right side has no effect. This has proven to be a minor annoyance, but when you consider the comparatively low price of this product, that's a drawback I'm more than willing to accept.

Phone did not work: home button did not work at all and phone turned off randomly even when fully charged. Since it was "Certified Refurbished," I find that unacceptable. Buy at your own risk. Also beware, the positive reviews seem fake. I would normally rebuy a defective product but given my experience I'm going to go another route when buying a new phone.

The iPhone 5 is great. No scratches and everything turned out well. I wish it had a tool where I could open up the SMS card holder/opening. Overall, I love my new phone. I'm just having trouble with Siri.
Battery would not hold a charge
This phone was beat all to hell. Chips and scratches everywhere. Doesn’t work either will be returning!
Battery does not stay charged overnight.  Disappointed with battery not phone.

Back camera doesn't work. I bought the cellphone to bring it out of the country as a gift and the camera doesn't work. Now It's too late to return. Embarrassing experience. Don't waste your time here. The cellphone also doesn't come inside an Apple box, no headphones nor original Apple charger.
Thank you. Delivery in estimated time the package arrived in excellent condition and working excellently and is just what you order. I recommend it 100%
Seen a lot of bad reviews but it’s been a month & my daughters phone still works perfectly

I was a terrible purchase. I saved up my money to buy this and wasted every penny. I needed a new phone because my phone battery was damage and drained within seconds. Then when I buy this one, and not only did it have a cracked screen, but It also has battery issues. I cannot take it off the charger without it dying within seconds. I emailed you guys to get a refund or a replacement but was ignored. I usually always have nothing but decent things to say about amazon and my purchases, but this was extremely poor service.
Still working fine even after going thru a wash cycle!

I bought this for my 13 year old daughter and she was so excited to get it.  Since the beginning the signal was incredibly weak ( I have other Iphones that the signals are fine where I live) like something was wrong with the attenna.  Now 3 months later, despite her taking great care of it and it still looking like new the phone is inoperable and will not turn on but only flashes when charging.  I understand that it was a used phone but for the cost and for it only to last 3 months is a bit ridiculous.

Phone was unlocked upon purchase and worked fine until a restore caused it to restore to its locked status. SIM card no longer works in it. From the best I can tell, the provider unlocked the phone through hacking methods. Do not buy,
Positive:

You sold me a phone with a dead battery in it an iPhone 5 that I spent over $200 on the product was for an autistic teenager now after I get his arm fixed from him doing a massive fit because the battery only last an hour at a f****** time I will make sure you get it back are we clear on this thank you

It doesn't work, half my screen stops working randomly it turns off at 75% it crashes for no reason it drops my calls my internet won't work I don't receive calls/ text it freezes for hours at a time I can't hang up calls and it won't let me delete things when I delet pictures or apps it re downloads it I thought that was weird it types things or opens them whe in not even touching my screen
It works great, looks like new

The battery is extremely short lived. It will show over 50% charged and then turn off within 5 minutes. The phone has to be constantly charging.  Not worth it for the price that was paid for a refurbished phone.
phone is ok, battery is not good

I bought this phone for my mom who does not live in the US. On the outside it seemed ok. But when she introduced the sim card she noticed that the screen had a big pink stain. It's on the screen, all the time, making it really difficult to use.
didnt work! said it needed a sim card and wouldnt proceed past the set up screen because it didnt have one. We bought for use as a wifi only device.
Easy to move to new AT&T non contract account.  Charger wasn't iphone brand but works great.  We read bad reviews on this refurbished phone, but phone exceeded our expectations.
Bought this for my nepbew and he has had problems with it ever since. The phone runs hot and the battery doesn't stay charged.  He is so mad because he really loves the phone.
It said comparable to AT&T but I received a Verizon Apple iPhone. And it keeps dying at random times first time my phone was at 30% yesterday it was 52% nor today at 40%.
The phone is perfect. It looks and operates just like new. A really great bargain.
Battery died fast
Great Item

I wanted to go back to a smaller phone after using the phablets for the past 5 years starting with the Note 2.  I was in Japan for a summer and noticed that nobody was using an oversized phone.  Thought that was interesting, so I bought this and it's been great.  It just fits in hand better, I can reach all parts of the screen with my thumb, and the battery just lasts longer than the new phones.  Still the seamless iphone experience if that's what you're after.
Good

Worked for a couple of days. Now the battery doesn't hold a charge and it dies after 10 minutes. When I plug it back in, it shows 70 percent charged and it just goes up and down. Have to buy another one.

DONT BUY IT keep you time "Refurbished NEW " UFFF yea people rigth about the battery only 1 hour hold battery 100% to 0 WATH what is tha No good for the price 200$ Naaa is used scratch dent dirty Naaa Of course I return

Would you not think a phone would work after 1 month of use. The ringer toggle quit working after having it for 31 days. Would like a replacement but they have a return policy of 30 days. I think they know more about the garbage they are selling then they let on.

I bought this for my girlfriend and everything seems to work properly.  Activated it this morning and we're just waiting for the carrier to update it so data works.  Only issue is we have to push the right side of the power button to turn it on and off.  Holding the middle of it only locks the phone.  Probably because the power button was replaced when refurbished.  Other than that it's fine.  I will be ordering myself one next week from the same seller.
The phone arrived on time and looked good but the battery is very unpredictable and the phone has to be charged constantly. That makes the phone very unreliable. Very disappointed!
My daughter loves her phone
BUYER BEWARE- Worst phone ever. Only worked one week without a peoblem. Now phone will not even turn on. Been ripped off twice as we returned another iPhone last month.
Battery tested by Apple and battery has to be replaced (needed for replacement or would have returned. Now another $59 & tax. No apple box or chargers either! Cheap is expensive

I have no idea why I didn't check the reviews before I purchased from this vendor, but I wish I had.  As others have mentioned, the battery dies almost immediately and certain apps do not work at all.  I can't believe that this device was actually checked out and "certified" before they shipped it to me.  I was able to get a refund, but a  huge hassle to have to find another phone.
Bought it for my kid for Xmas. Went through a grand total of 4 batteries. That’s including the one that came with the phone. Buy new not refurbished. It’s also taking forever to get my refund .
Love my phone

This unlocked iPhone 5 that I bought is a really nice iPhone, I'm happy I decided to upgrade my phone. Hopefully the next person that orders one gets a good battery because the one that was in my iPhone 5 was shot so now I have ordered a replacement battery.

said it was factory refurbished the battery will not hold a charge I had already installed a glass screen protector which cost $40 and didn't want to spend another 40.00 on another screen protector so I had battery replaced by Apple. Not happy

Working great!

I LIKE THIS PHONE ESP SINCE IT IS LARGER THAT MAKES IT EASIER FOR ME TO READ.  NOW THAT I HAVE IT FOR SOMETIME AND IT IS REFURBISHED I HAVE RECOGNIZED SOME PROS AND CONS.  U HAVE TO RECHARGE THE BATTERY EVERY 3-4 HOURS DURING THE DAY, DOESN'T LAST TOO LONG.  SOMETIMES IT ACTS A LITTLE CRAZY BY NOT BEING ABLE TO SEND/RECEIVE TEXT MESSAGES AND/OR MAKE A CALL WHEN IT FREEZES UP.  I JUST SHUT IT DOWN AND THEN RESTART AND ITS FINE.  THIS HAS HAPPENED 2 TIMES SINCE I'VE HAD IT.  THE PHONE ITSELF IS VERY CLEAR AND TAKES GOOD PICS.

It is an Apple iPhone 5 16GB - Unlocked - White (Certified Refurbished) This phone has battery problems, problems with the touch screen and the camera.

it works nice

The on/off button sticks so it's hard to lock the phone, also the battery doesn't hold its charge well. I think that's a common problem with iPhones . It can go instantly from 60% to 20% and then from 20% to zero and turn off completely.
This phone was a great purchase, however, it took a few days to work out the bugs.  After that it works perfect!  I love it!
I am so happy with my phone! Everything works great! Battery life is long! If I ever need another replacement I'll be ordering from this Company again!

Came Boxed Nice and seems to be working Great. My wife is very Happy.

So I gave it a star because I received something in the mail.  We have the phone now activated and have tried to work with it for almost 2 months.  Out of the box (obvious 3rd party refurb) the packaging was cracked, an edge was chipped, and it had all the pertainate information on a big sticker, that took goo gone to remove, on the back of the phone.  The data has never worked on this phone.  We have been arguing with Net10 this whole time blaming them for the shorty service but now believe it has to do with the hardware. For the last 3 or so weeks a new development is random, back to back repeated, unprompted restarts.  We don't tell it to do it.... it just does.  Today I pulled it out of the case we have it in only to fine that as I turn the phone something dense shifts inside.  I have to assume that this is the battery loose inside the case as there is nothing else with this kind of density in the hardware.  I have to imagine that if the battery is loose and has been the delicate internals are likely a mess.  I will update posting as soon as I hear from those seller on this l, so far, abysmal example of Apple hardware.

As soon as the 60 days were up the phone has stopped working..bad screen..black with white lines running through...so disappointed..we don't know if it will fix..out $300!! Unacceptable!! Only gave the one star cause it made me.
This phone is great. The small annoyances of the 4S are gone with the 5. And buying refurbished is even better. A practically new phone for half the price? SOLD!

I was not sure what to expect but knew my mom would not want to spend the money for a new iPhone.  So we took a chance.  The phone came in excellent condition.  Took it to AT&T today with her old flip phone and the manager cut her old SIM card to fit the new phone and we were in business.  Put an invisible shield on it and Mom is thrilled and having a blast with her new phone.  Only negative was it need to be completely charged but that was not a big deal.

Arrived on time, it looks like new!  Works great, holds a charge, recharges quickly.  Went ahead and ordered one for my husband!  After a couple of weeks the home button stopped working.  My son pointed out to me that it wasn't an original button, they are refurbished phones so it is not unexpected that the home button would have been repaired.  I returned the phone and they issued a refund.  I ordered another one from them the same day I shipped the first one back.  This replacement phone is working great, holds a charge for a long time, charges quickly, all the buttons work great.  When I'm ready to upgrade to a 6 I hope this company has refurbished phones, I wouldn't hesitate to buy from them again.

The iPhone 5 is in excellent condition.  A wall charger and a USB charging cable were included.  No other accessories were included.  Delivery via Prime arrived on schedule.  The only minor problem is that a tool to allow installing a SIM card was not included.  The primary reason to buy an unlocked phone is to be able to easily change cell service providers; a SIM card tool should be provided (Apple provides SIM card tools with new unlocked phones).  However, a straightened paper clip can be used instead of the Apple tool so this is a minor issue.
